prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAM_MEZZE_30to60",
  "name": "Family Middle Eastern & Greek Mezze Nights",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "MiddleEastern",
      "Greek",
      "Turkish"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Intermediate"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Medium"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Sheet-Pan Chicken Shawarma with Herbed Basmati and Mezze Tray",
  "description": "Oven-roasted shawarma-style chicken and peppers with stovetop herbed basmati rice, quick yogurt-mint sauce, warm pita, and hummus for a build-your-own family plate.",
  "servings": "Serves 4 (2 adults + 2 kids)",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Heat oven to 220°C (425°F).",
    "Slice red onion into wedges and bell peppers into strips.",
    "Cut chicken thigh fillets into large bite-size pieces.",
    "In a bowl, mix shawarma paste with olive oil and crushed garlic.",
    "Rinse basmati rice under cold water until it runs clear; drain.",
    "Chop parsley and mint; set some for rice and some for garnish.",
    "Dice cucumber and tomatoes for a simple side.",
    "Halve a lemon; cut remaining into wedges for serving."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Toss chicken, red onion, and bell peppers with the shawarma paste mixture, sea salt, and black pepper; spread on a large sheet pan.",
    "Roast on middle rack for 20–25 minutes until chicken is cooked through and edges char.",
    "While chicken roasts, bring chicken stock to a boil in a pot; add rinsed basmati rice and a pinch of sea salt. Reduce to low, cover, and simmer 12 minutes; rest off heat 5 minutes.",
    "Stir chopped parsley into the rice and fluff with a fork.",
    "In a small bowl, combine yogurt, a squeeze of lemon, chopped mint, sea salt, and black pepper to make a quick sauce.",
    "Warm pita bread on the oven rack for 2–3 minutes.",
    "Transfer roasted chicken and vegetables to a platter; sprinkle with sumac and optional chili flakes. Drizzle with lemon.",
    "Serve family-style with herbed rice, yogurt-mint sauce, hummus, cucumber and tomatoes, and warm pita."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thigh fillets",
      "quantity": "800 g",
      "preparation": "cut into large bite-size pieces"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "shawarma paste",
      "quantity": "3 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "crushed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "sliced into strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sea salt",
      "quantity": "1.5 teaspoons",
      "preparation": "divided, to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "basmati rice",
      "quantity": "1.5 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken stock",
      "quantity": "3 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "1/3 cup",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "yogurt",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mint",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1–2",
      "preparation": "1 juiced, rest cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pita bread",
      "quantity": "4–6 rounds"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "hummus",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cucumber",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomatoes",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sumac",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "for garnish"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chili flakes",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "optional"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Greek",
      "MiddleEastern"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Intermediate"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Medium"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Gluten",
      "Sesame"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
